content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Cultural presentation (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: Ms. Kawamura says it is hard to get to her school because

choices.label: she has to climb up a hill and a long stairway
she has to walk across a big field
the school is located in a congested area
the school is far away from her home

content.answer: she has to climb up a hill and a long stairway

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
